name: LotteryUSA
0:
”Alexa, open lottery u. s. a.”
”What's the latest lotto results”
”What's the Mega Millions jackpot?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lottery u. s. a.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use the lottery u. s. a. Skill to get fast and accurate lottery results for all major lotteries. 

lottery u. s. a. will give you the latest results and jackpots for a wide variety of draw games across 46 states. This also includes all the major multistate games:

Powerball, Mega Millions, Lotto America, Lucky For Life, Cash 4 Life and Gimme Five.

It’s quick, easy and simple. Get started by asking Alexa to “Open lottery u. s. a.”.

Results:
Need the latest results quickly?

• Say “Powerball?” 

and almost instantly lottery u. s. a. will bring you the latest Powerball results. It works for any game, just replace Powerball with the game you’re interested in. It doesn’t have to be a multistate game either, it can be a state specific game, for example:

• “Florida Lotto” or “California Super Lotto”

Jackpots:

Want to know the jackpot? Easy. 

• Say “Mega Millions jackpot?” or “Tell me the New York Lotto jackpot.”

and you’ll hear the upcoming, estimated jackpot for the game you mentioned. 

We want you to get what you need with no fuss, so here are some more useful phrases for getting the most out of the lottery u. s. a. Alexa Skill.
Starting

“Alexa, open lottery u. s. a.”, this opens the skill, and once it’s open you won’t need to say “lottery u. s. a.” again. Otherwise, make sure you say “Alexa, ask lottery u. s. a.” at the start of your question.

For the following examples, replace [game] with the game you are interested in and [state] with the state the game is played in. Multistate games do not require a [state] to be said.

Results
• “I want to check the [game] numbers”
• “What’s the latest [state] [game] results?”
• “Do you know the [game] [state] results?”
• “I need the results for [state]”
• “[game] [state] latest results”

Jackpots:
• “Check the jackpot for [game].”
• “Tell me the [state] [game] jackpot”
• “Have you got the [game] [state] jackpot?”
• “What’s the latest jackpot for [game]?”
• “I want to check the [game] top prize”

Just some of the 46 states we cover:
• New York
• Florida
• Michigan
• New Jersey
• Illinois
• Virginia
• North Carolina
• Georgia
• South Carolina
• Ohio

Some of the draw games available:
• New York Take 5
• Florida Fantasy 5
• California Super Lotto Plus
• Georgia Fantasy 5 
• Michigan Classic Lotto 47
• Massachusetts Mass Cash
• Illinois Lotto
• Ohio Rolling Cash 5
• Arizona Fantasy 5
• Arkansas Natural State Jackpot

Remember, just say “Help” while the lottery u. s. a. skill is open for assistance.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
